rows.label: qst200522_msg001
rows.name:
Looks like everyone really loves
your sweets, Yuou. Me included!

rows.label: qst200522_msg002
rows.name:
When all the fighting's over and we
can finally settle down, I can't wait
to see you make a name for yourself!

rows.label: qst200522_msg003
rows.name:
Looks like everyone's gone gaga over
your sweets, Yuou. Me included!

rows.label: qst200522_msg004
rows.name:
When all this fighting nonsense is
over, I hope we can all sit down
and enjoy your sweets in peace.

rows.label: qst200522_msg005
rows.name:
It seems everyone is quite
besotted with your sweets,
Yuou. I myself am no exception.

rows.label: qst200522_msg006
rows.name:
When the war has ended and peace
is restored, I look forward to
seeing your business flourish.

rows.label: qst200522_msg007
rows.name:
I have to say, people have gone
bonkers over your sweets, Yuou!
That goes for me as well!

rows.label: qst200522_msg008
rows.name:
Once we're finished with all this
fighting malarkey, you should settle
down here. Do what you love most.

rows.label: qst200522_msg009
rows.name:
I'd never have gotten this
opportunity if you hadn't awakened
me from my Core Crystal, Rex...

rows.label: qst200522_msg019
rows.name:
I'd never have gotten this
opportunity if you hadn't awakened
me from my Core Crystal, Nia...

rows.label: qst200522_msg020
rows.name:
I'd never have gotten this opportunity
if you hadn't awakened me from my
Core Crystal, Meleph...

rows.label: qst200522_msg025
rows.name:
I'd never have gotten this
opportunity if you hadn't awakened
me from my Core Crystal, Zeke...

rows.label: qst200522_msg021
rows.name: I exist to serve you, to keep you safe.

rows.label: qst200522_msg010
rows.name:
So it never really crossed my
mind to think about what I'd do
after I left the battlefield.

rows.label: qst200522_msg011
rows.name:
But maybe someday... when
this is all over...

rows.label: qst200522_msg012
rows.name:
I'll make candy for you,
and we can all sit down
together and have a blast!

rows.label: qst200522_msg022
rows.name:
I'll make candy for you,
and we can all sit down
together and have a blast!

rows.label: qst200522_msg023
rows.name:
I'll make candy for you,
and we can all sit down
together and have a blast!

rows.label: qst200522_msg024
rows.name:
I'll make candy for you,
and we can all sit down
together and have a blast!

rows.label: qst200522_msg013
rows.name:
What do you say? Will you
let me subject you to some
sweet, sweet celebration?

rows.label: qst200522_msg014
rows.name: Definitely!

rows.label: qst200522_msg015
rows.name: But of course!

rows.label: qst200522_msg016
rows.name: I look forward to it.

rows.label: qst200522_msg017
rows.name: Heck yeah!
